description: A boy and his family moving into a supposedly haunted hotel on the edge of a small town.
name: Secrets of Sulphur Springs

review.name: For kids? Maybe.. excellent anyway? Definitely
review.reviewBody:
So I was sat at home, bored. My kid was off doing whatever it is kids do when they're in their rooms. I was lazily flicking through Disney+ and spotted this show. I thought, "That'll do for the afternoon."

So there I was, a 42 year old flabby man watching a mystery show for kids... And it hooked me. The first coup of episodes drew me and I really wanted to know what happened to the missing girl and what the adults knew.

The kids in this show are all fantastic, they play their roles incredibly well. The core mystery is interesting and it turns and twists well through the whole show. It's paced incredibly well, with each episode only being around 20 minutes once intro and recaps etc are done.

All in all a fantastic show that keeps the intrigue up, the pace held and turns interesting and surprising.

Well worth a watch for adults... And kids too.

trailer.description: It is about a boy and his family moving into a supposedly haunted hotel on the edge of a small town.
